common_params: [{"name":"partner_id","type":"int","sample":"1","description":"Partner ID is assigned upon registration is successful. Required for all requests."},{"name":"timestamp","type":"timestamp","sample":"1610000000","description":"This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Expires in 5 minutes."},{"name":"access_token","type":"string","sample":"c09222e3fc40ffb25fc947f738b1abf1","description":"The token for API access, using to identify your permission to the api. Valid for multiple use and expires in 4 hours."},{"name":"shop_id","type":"int","sample":"600000","description":"Shopee's unique identifier for a shop. Required param for most APIs."},{"name":"sign","type":"string","sample":"e318d3e932719916a9f9ebb57e2011961bd47abfa54a36e040d050d8931596e2","description":"Signature generated by partner_id, api path, timestamp, access_token, shop_id and partner_key via HMAC-SHA256 hashing algorithm. More details: https://open.shopee.com/documents?module=87&type=2&id=58&version=2"}]
define: For each campaign, return: campaign basic info (name, status, promotion period, message), selected product list (with product name & ID), selected affiliate list (with affiliate names)

error_list.name: error_business
error_list.description: Sorry you don't have access to AMS features.

error_list.name: error_business
error_list.description: Please agree to the AMS T&C in Seller Center - Affiliate Marketing Solutions first before using Open API.

error_list.name: error_business
error_list.description: The seller commission operation is frozen.

params:
{"request_params":[{"description":"

Campaign id for query.


Note: For campaigns with campaign_source = ShopeeManaged, cannot be queried for details through this API.

","name":"campaign_id","sample":"101","type":"int64","required":"True","key":"jNfPKtm"}],"response_params":[{"description":"

Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

","name":"error","sample":"error_business","type":"string","required":null,"key":"EbnyAFN"},{"description":"

Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

","name":"message","sample":"Please agree to the AMS T&C in Seller Center - Affiliate Marketing Solutions first before using Open API.","type":"string","required":null,"key":"pFBDFkZ"},{"name":"request_id","type":"string","sample":"b937c04e554847789cbf3fe33a0ad5f1","description":"

The identifier for an API request for error tracking.

","key":"AyXKyPn"},{"description":"

Detail informations you are querying.

","name":"response","sample":"","type":"object","required":null,"key":"EHXeWaP","children":[{"description":"

The name of the current campaign.

","name":"campaign_name","sample":"campaign name","type":"string","required":null,"key":"fEpEeFf"},{"description":"

Campaign Status: 

Upcoming
Ongoing
Ended
Cancelled
Draft
Terminating
Terminated
Paused

","name":"commission_status","sample":"Ongoing","type":"string","required":null,"key":"nprJwPn"},{"description":"

The start time of the current campaign.

","name":"period_start_time","sample":"1735660800","type":"timestamp","required":null,"key":"RdmpME"},{"description":"

The end time of the current campaign, if get 32503651199 (2999-12-31 23:59:59), it means no limit.

","name":"period_end_time","sample":"32503651199","type":"timestamp","required":null,"key":"yQmCCYm"},{"description":"

Has the current campaign set a budget.


Note: TH not supported

","name":"is_set_budget","sample":"true","type":"boolean","required":null,"key":"FbaCfXk"},{"description":"

The budget of the current campaign.


Note: TH not supported

","name":"budget","sample":"10000.0","type":"float","required":null,"key":"nsaaGsD"},{"description":"

The budget already spent on the current campaign.


Note: TH not supported

","name":"budget_cost","sample":"500.5","type":"float","required":null,"key":"hRtpeJB"},{"description":"

The message displayed to affiliates.

","name":"seller_message","sample":"Hello, pleasant cooperation.","type":"string","required":null,"key":"mkSDemW"},{"description":"

Pending Terminated Time.

","name":"pending_terminated_time","sample":"1735660800","type":"timestamp","required":null,"key":"BGYyhnD"},{"description":"

The list of affiliates associated with the current campaign.

","name":"affiliate_list","sample":"","type":"object[]","required":null,"key":"XjEQzNd","children":[{"description":"

The unique key for affiliate, can call v2.ams.query_affiliate_list to get affiliate details.

","name":"affiliate_id","sample":"11301234567","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"TRBEFkw"}]},{"description":"

The list of items associated with the current campaign.

","name":"item_list","sample":"","type":"object[]","required":null,"key":"pwbwPrQ","children":[{"description":"

Item ID.

","name":"item_id","sample":"101","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"MJGPbsN"},{"description":"

Item Name.

","name":"item_name","sample":"item a","type":"string","required":null,"key":"DnCtrWd"},{"description":"

Commission rate of current item, 1.1 means 1.1%, support two decimal places.

","name":"rate","sample":"1.1","type":"float","required":null,"key":"msHJhYY"},{"description":"

Max Commission Rate Current Day, 1.1 means 1.1%, support two decimal places.

","name":"max_commission_rate_current_day","sample":"1.1","type":"float","required":null,"key":"zGNCeZE"},{"description":"

Commission Protection List.

","name":"commission_protection_list","sample":"","type":"object[]","required":null,"key":"xiJzida","children":[{"description":"

Commission Rate, 1.1 means 1.1%, support two decimal places.

","name":"commission_rate","sample":"1.1","type":"float","required":null,"key":"jFXSFRc"},{"description":"

Protection Period End Time.

","name":"protection_period_end_time","sample":"1735660800","type":"timestamp","required":null,"key":"FabnDt"}]}]}]}]}
